description: Examination of the marketing aspects of products or services exclusive of their promotion, pricing or distribution. Focuses on decisions regarding product introduction, positioning, improvements, and deletion, and the tools available for making these decisions.
name: NEW PRODUCT MANAGEMENT

values.comments:
Marketing 221 examines the marketing aspects of products and is a total immersion in the new product development process. The course focuses on decisions regarding product introduction, positioning, improvements, deletion, and the tools available for making these decisions.

The course follows the textbook closely leading one student to call the course discussions “redundant… Discussions didn’t really touch upon anything new or profound.”

While one student commented that “it is very difficult to understand” Professor Peres, another enjoyed the course and “Peres’s ability to use her experience in the field as application for the course.”

Although students remain divided about the professor, they seem to agree that the guest speakers added to the class.
